data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 175,505 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Arequipa.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arequipa, Peru
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Arequipa, Peru to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Arequipa to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Arequipa to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Japanese people. Make the Japanese people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Arequipa, Peru into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Arequipa, Peru.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Arequipa, Peru humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?
